RTCRemoteOutboundRtpStreamStatsKind.summary: The kind property of the dictionary is a string indicating whether the described {{Glossary("RTP")}} stream contains audio or video media.

remarks.para:
This string will always be the same as the of the object carried by the stream.
It will also match the statistics object's property's media type.

RTCRemoteOutboundRtpStreamStatsKind.value: The kinds is always one of:
